title: Methodology for Average Historical Emissions !!!
description: Objective This Data Science for Good Competition intends to use remote sensing techniques to understand Environmental Emissions. Since the whole concept of Satellite Imagery and can be a little overwhelming, this is just an introductory kernel, where I try to explain the various terms and datasets related to satellite Imagery.
